snippet: Michael Albasini of Switzerland beat four other riders in a sprint finish to win the hilly fourth stage of the Paris-Nice race.
abstract: Michael Albasini of Switzerland beats four other riders in sprint finish to win hilly fourth stage of Paris-Nice cycling race.
lead_paragraph: Michael Albasini of Switzerland beat four other riders in a sprint finish to win the hilly fourth stage of the Paris-Nice race.

headline.seo: Michael Albasini Wins Fourth Stage of Paris-Nice Race
headline.main: Swiss Rider Wins Fourth Stage of Paris-Nice Race
